name: Nurturey
0:
”Alexa, open Nurturey”
”What is my child's measurements”
”Update my child's measurements”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nurturey
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this first use case launch, parents will be able to update the measurement of their children (Height and Weight) in the Nurturey app, simply by instructing Alexa.

Prerequisite:
- Account on Nurturey
- Set-up completed through iPhone/Android app.
